data.title: David Burton - Associate Vice President of Sales at Mobiveil
data.meta_description: David Burton has held a variety of sales positions in the technology industry since 2002.
data.text:
David Burton has held a variety of sales positions in the technology industry since 2002. In that year, they began their career as the Director of Sales for the Western Region of Insilicon Corporation, which was later acquired by Synopsys. In 2003, they held two positions, one as a Sales Executive for Get2Chip, which was also acquired by Cadence, and one as a Sales Specialist for Cadence. David then moved to TAEUS International Corporation in 2007 as a Sales Executive. Following that, they held a Sales Executive position for Chipworks, which was acquired by TechInsights, from 2009 to 2013. David then moved to Atrenta in 2013, where they held two positions, one as a Sales Executive and one as a Sales Consultant. In 2015, they became a Sales Executive at REAL INTENT. In 2020, they were promoted to Director of Worldwide Sales at NoBug Consulting. Most recently, in 2021, they were appointed as the Associate Vice President of Sales at Mobiveil Inc.

David Burton has an education history that includes Chabot College. David has obtained certifications from LinkedIn, Hewlett Packard Company, Dale Carnegie, Naham Parsons, and ALTIFY LIMITED. The most recent certification obtained was the IoT Foundations: Fundamentals from LinkedIn in June 2019.
